heading: HB07721
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE BALA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - BUSAY NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL EXTENSION IN BARANGAY BUSAY, MUNICIPALITY OF MOALBOAL, PROVINCE OF CEBU FROM THE BALA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS BUSAY (MOALBOAL) NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
